title: The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election
text:
The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election 6:22pm GMT - 02:27 
Far-right activists are collaborating online to influence Italy's election, according to researchers at a counter extremism NGO who have gone undercover in private chats on encrypted apps. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Far-right activists are collaborating online to influence Italy's election, according to researchers at a counter extremism NGO who have gone undercover in private chats on encrypted apps. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CJZ2PR
